해외 로그인 차단 도움말:
Every authentication tries from not only PC but also Mobile web, app, SMTP AUTH, IMAP, POP and PC Messenger sign-in are blocked if you set this [Enable].
Please set this [Disable] when you go on a business trip or a trip.
비밀번호 변경 설명:
We encourage you to change your password periodically.
For your safety, please enter a new password.
다음에 변경하기 설명: The pop-up asking you to change your password will not be displayed for the next 30 days if you click "Next Time".
Whoever holds another job can change a department priority.
인증 완료: Your email address has been verified successfully.
※ Verification e-mail has been sent. After confirming the mail, [Authenticate] must be performed to complete the authentication.
Please enter your external mail address.
외부메일툴팁: If you have forgotten your password, a temporary password will be sent to the external mail.
현재 이메일 주소와 동일합니다. 다른 주소를 입력해 주세요: You can't use the same email address for external mail address. Please enter another email address.
사용기기 등록 안내: If registered device information is not shown, Please sign out and log in again. Device will be registered.
기본형 메뉴 설명:
Classic Menu.
Menu buttons will be arrayed at the top.
2.0 메뉴 설명:
All menu will be shown by one button.
It is able to extend workspace by folding side menu.
No registered information of mobile device.

비밀번호 변경 설명1: The existing password must be changed.
비밀번호 변경 설명2: When you change your password, your PC messenger, mobile app, and your external mail account will all be logged out.
비밀번호 변경 추천규칙1: Use a combination of {{arg2}} in  {{arg1}} characters.
비밀번호 변경 추천규칙2: Avoid using the same character repetition, continuous characters and same old passwords.
주 40시간 초과근무: Overtime work over 40 hours per week
주 52시간 초과근무: Overtime work over 52 hours per week
최대 근무시간 초과 전: Before work over max working time
출근 체크 설명: Start Work : if didn't press Start work, Get alarm when the start working time
퇴근 체크 설명: End Work : if didn't press End work, Get alarm when the end working time
휴게시간 종료 설명: End of rest time : Get alarm when the end of rest time
40시간 초과 전 설명: Before work 40 hours over : Get alarm before work 40 hours over
40시간 초과 설명: Work over 40 hours over : Get alarm when work over 40 hours over
52시간 초과 전 설명: Before work 52 hours over : Get alarm before work 52 hours over
52시간 초과 설명: Work over 52 hours over : Get alarm when work over 52 hours over
기본 근무시간 초과 전 설명: Before work over default time : Get alarm before default time are exceeded based on the remaining time of the month.
기본 근무시간 초과 설명: Work over default time : Get alarm when default time are exceeded based on the remaining time of the month.
최대 근무시간 초과 전 설명: Before work over max working time : Get alarm before max working time are exceeded based on the remaining time of the month.
최대 근무시간 초과 설명: Work over max working time : Get alarm when max working time are exceeded based on the remaining time of the month.
연장 근무시간 초과 전: Before over the time limit of overtime work
연장 근무시간 초과: Over the time limit of overtime work
연장 근무시간 초과 전 설명: Before over the time limit of overtime work : Get alarm before over the time limit based on remaining over working hours
연장 근무시간 초과 설명: Over the time limit of overtime work : Get alarm when over the time limit based on remaining over working hours
2.6 메뉴 설명:
Menu is located in the left sidebar.
Workspace is optimized for wide screen.
결재 반송 원문서기안자 설명: The Orig. Doc.drafter : Receives alarm from the recipient(head of dept.) or approval manager when the document is rejected.
운영자로 설정된 사용자 설명: User set as manager: Received alarm of attendence information such as missed check or late attendance when user sets as manager or department head
캘린더 댓글 댓글등록자 설명: Comments Submitter: if not a participant, receiving notifications when new comments Comments on registered Registration Schedule (No notification is sent even if comments are registered in the entire company's schedule)
자동퇴근 설명: Auto-end work: If you don't check off work, you will be notified after work automatically at the automatic time set by the administrator or the last time you receive Beacon.
겸직자 비밀번호 동기화 설명: {{arg1}} is a concurrent user, and when activated with toggle switch button ON, passwords for other sites will be synchronized with the password you change now.
겸직자 비밀번호 동기화 문의: Contact your system administrator for questions about synchronizing your concurrent employee password.
